title: Vietnam Veterans Memorial: Volunteer
body: Volunteer       The Vietnam Veterans Memorial provides a unique oppurtunity for Volunteering.  The Memorial is a place where volunteers can assist visitors with general questions, looking up names and assisting with name rubbings.  The National Park Service Rangers collect artifacts left at the wall daily, then they are catologued and added to the Vietnam Veterans Memorial Collection. Volunteering at the Vietnam Veterans Memorial can be done through the Vietnam Veterans Memorial Fund or through The National Mall and Memorial Parks links below.
